name: Art Mahjong 4
description:
Excellent entertainment awaits you in this latest version of the popular "Art Mahjong" series. The game offers many challenging levels and mahjongg boards that, once unlocked, reveal beautiful backgrounds.

A large selection of different tile sets with easily recognizable as well as colorful motifs and various settings make the game a visual pleasure.

Suitable for beginners as well as for the passionate Mahjongg player, "Art Mahjong 4" with its different Mahjongg variants offers both challenging game fun and an entertaining pastime for in between.


Features:

- Many different mahjongg boards and settings
- 3 different game modes
- 2 different Mahjong game variants
- Beautiful, unlockable backgrounds
- Different tile sets themed and classic
- Choice of perspective and zoom
- Hours of challenging entertainment
